main event: An observer reported seeing several bright lights in the sky over Hankins, New York on November 3, 1966.
interesting points: The observer noted lights of various colors (red, green, orange, and white) that blinked and pulsed,The objects disappeared and reappeared multiple times during the sighting,No physical evidence was found,The observer indicated that the lights appeared every night after the initial sighting,The observer described the lights as being about the size of airplane lights with no definite formation.
sighted object: bright lights of various colors in the sky
